title: Unsuitable
description: Can they make trailblazing and homemaking fit, or is love just another gender stereotype?Audrey broke the glass ceiling.Reece swapped a blue collar for a pink collar job. She’s a single mum by design. He’s a nanny by choice.She gets passed over for promotion. He struggles to find a job.She takes a chance on him. He’s worth more than he knows.There’s an imbalance of power. There’s an age difference.There’s a child whose favourite word is no.Everything about them being together is unsuitable.Except for love.
author: Ainslie Paton
